item.title: Part 3 - LSM Trees: The Write-Speed Demons
item.description:
How the LSM Tree Factory Works

graph TD subgraph RAM [Volatile Memory] A[Write Request] --> B[Write Ahead Log - WAL] A --> C[MemTable - Sorted SkipList] end subgraph DISK [Persistent Storage] C -- "Flush when full (e.g. 64MB)" --> D[SSTable L0 - Newest] D -- "Compaction" --> E[SSTable L1] E -- "Compaction" --> F[SSTable L2 - Oldest/Largest] end subgraph Optimization [Read Boosters] G[Bloom Filter] -. "Checks before disk read" .-> D end
